title.en: You Remember the Taste of a Man, Don't You? Take Off Your Clothes and I'll Teach You…

altTitles.ja: 男の味、覚えたな？～ほどいて脱がせて指南して

description.en: "I'm saying I'll teach you. That is, if you're prepared for it." Even if it is to protect the bar, he’s talking about sex... Right? When her mother is hospitalized, inexperienced Nagisa takes on the responsibility of managing the family bar, and visits the beauty stylist next door to have her hair and clothing done up to look the part of a proper bar proprietress.But when Kei, the owner, first sees her, he looks Nagisa up and down and even goes so far as to touch her body! "As you are now, the bar’s done for," he tells her mercilessly. "So teach me how to handle men!!" Nagisa pleads. His gaze penetrates her deep where no man has ever touched Nagisa before, and even though she tries to tell him to stop her body can't help but react to him... What do I do? If we keep going, I'll end up having sex with Kei!
